name: bnj534
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
